messages.title: Election Campaign
messages.content: Islington Conservatives have been campaigning hard for a fairer deal for council leaseholders and tenants in the borough.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Local Conservatives want reform of our housing services, with more competitive tendering, quality repairs, and lower management costs.
The Conservatives have been taking up cases, using PricewaterhouseCoopers to investigate concerns about the cost and quality of work by Partners for Improvement, Islington.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Conservatives can beat Labour in Islington South.

housing.content: Local Conservatives want reform of our housing services, with more competitive tendering, quality repairs, and lower management costs.

images.caption: Graph showing potential voting outcomes with percentages

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. Thursday 6th May is your chance to bring real change to Islington. Don’t miss your chance to get your voice heard!
